voteny-unvote-link:
Displayed to the user after their vote has been successfully added; they can click on this link to remove their vote.
{{Identical|Unvote}}
voteny-community-score:
Community score is the average of votes a page has been given.

Parameters:
* $1 - the actual score in numbers (i.e. 4.5 or 3)
voteny-remove:
Link title, clicking on this link removes your vote. Refer to the [[mw:File:VoteNY.png|image]] for details.
{{Identical|Remove}}
voteny-gave-this:
Followed by the action link text {{msg-mw|Voteny-remove}}.

Parameter:
* $1 - a number, the vote the user gave to the page.

Refer to the [[mw:File:VoteNY.png|image]] for details.
topratings-no-pages: Displayed on Special:TopRatings if there are no top rated pages, i.e. if no pages have been rated on the wiki at all.
right-voteny:
{{doc-right|voteny}}
Right to place a vote on pages with the extension.
